data.description: Achieving our goals starts with supporting yours. Grow your career, access top-tier health and wellness benefits, build lasting connections with your team and our customers, and travel the world using our extensive route network.<br><br>Come join us to create what’s next. Let’s define tomorrow, together.<br><br><h2>Description</h2><p>At United, we offer internships, co-ops, and full-time opportunities for early-career professionals. In any role, you’re a key member of our team, contributing to real projects that help move the business forward while gaining hands-on experience, growing your professional skill set, and connecting with industry leaders. You’ll also have a chance to build community through our employee-run Business Resource Groups, participate in industry conferences, and enjoy unlimited standby travel anywhere we fly.  </p><p>During your summer experience, you will be fully immersed in our collaborative culture built on diversity of thought. Our teams will be looking for your curiosity and your unique point of view. We will look to push your development as an analyst and a leader alike through comprehensive, on-the-job training, leadership development workshops, and mentorships to help you navigate your internship. Interns will be given meaningful projects along with the opportunity to interact with and present to leadership.</p><p>As a Global Supply Chain and MRO Shops intern, you’ll work side-by-side with our TO professionals, taking on problems and learning about our industry. Interns will be placed throughout our system, depending on project needs at locations that may include Chicago, Houston, Los Angeles, New Jersey or San Francisco. Potential placements include but are not limited to teams in Supply Chain Insights, Inventory Management & Strategy, Engine Maintenance Management and Strategy, Supplier Strategy & Performance, Inventory Forecasting and Performance, Master Data and Logistics Services. <br> </p><h2>Qualifications</h2><div class="OutlineElement Ltr SCXW152121187 BCX8"
